column4: Could someone help me turn this repo url into a deb line please? I can't figure out how since it doesn't have the deb distro subdir structure. http://download.opensuse.org/repositories/security:/OpenVAS:/STABLE:/v3/xUbuntu_10.10/
Altough Linus took an architectural route that Tannenbaum finds ridiculous
That doesn't look like a standard debian repo. Don't know if it will work at all.
I think I'll just get the debs
